string-array.name: random_conversation
string-array.item: [10:34 PM, 4/26/2017] +31 6 41172341: Oi stop ignoring me cunt
[10:34 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: You\'re an actual fucking snake.
[10:35 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: I\'m done for real this time
[10:35 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: I\'m sure you can figure out why?
[10:35 PM, 4/26/2017] +31 6 41172341: No what the fuck are you freaking out for
[10:38 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: I know it now.
[10:39 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: Who gave you my password Kevin?
[10:40 PM, 4/26/2017] +31 6 41172341: You think I messed with your shit?
[10:40 PM, 4/26/2017] +31 6 41172341: What reason would I have to do that
[10:40 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: I didn't think you had any?
[10:41 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: But now I want to know why?
[10:41 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: Why the fuck did you do it?
[10:41 PM, 4/26/2017] +31 6 41172341: I didn't do shit and I'm getting fucking sick of your accusations
[10:41 PM, 4/26/2017] +31 6 41172341: Take your shit down a notch or this shit is over
[10:42 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: Are you serious rn
[10:42 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: You think I wouldn't ever figure it out?
[10:42 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: How stupid do you think I am?
[10:44 PM, 4/26/2017] Diya: Ok out of everyone I know
